title: cleaver revert is going to feel nice for bruisers
body:
But even better for {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:150}} (i dont consider this rat fuck a bruiser, he's an abomination)

Why even bother throwing us a bone when you don't care enough to make cleaver less effective on ranged?

replies.body:
bruisers are going to be the hardest hit by the cleaver change

tanks can atleast endure the damage for a while bryusers cannot

ok to the down voters, how will melee toplaners deal with buffs to graves jayce and lucian?

Whose damage though?

Most cleaver users have been nerfed enough that a 6% difference in armor reduction won't do too much, i think this is more aimed at toplane for champs like Darius, wukong.....maybe Riven? Who can rush it against tanks for extended fights.

Among the ranged only MF might notice a difference, but it´ll be pretty marginal since she´ll never grab the item before Duskblade and ghostblade if she can help it.

the adcs dont need to buy BC to reap the benefits, the shred helps them regardless if they/top/jungle has the item.

combine this with the changes to lord dominics this is a MASSIVE nerf to melee bruisers

i keep saying directly buff darius renekton and riven

LDR buffs aren't actually that big, and they are actually a nerf to midgame users as the health difference requirement is higher. 

And i really don't think a 6% difference in armor will do much one teamfights start, those who will use cleaver already do for the most part.

Biggest difference's will be early game in lane.

And Darius is getting buffed this patch, something about his passive bleed damage and something about AD.

Renekton doesn't seem to be needing anything according to his statistics aside from better armor shred to help deal with tanks.

You are correct that 6% wont do much itself but it is when it is stacked with the likes of lord dominics/mortal/last whisper and lethality items which end up completely negating the gold you spent on defensive items.

These kind of buffs or nerfs to tanks because 3 of them are strong is just ridiculous

In my experience stacking all those together on say Miss fortune just makes tanks like cho,lategame seju, maokai and rammus manageable, that´s probably how Riot view it as justified as well.

But i do pity everyone else caught in between who dont get compensation buffs :(

If they do view it that way it explains why they are terrible at balancing the game.

Why should all adcs be able to shred tanks, 2 seasons ago only kog and vayne were capable of it

It's not quite on the level of shredding them, they die if you have time to to shoot at them but it does take a while, but the weaker marksmen struggled like hell to make it work whenever dealing with anything more than a single beefy tank, they simple didn't output enough damage to match the tank.

At the worst point a Caitlyn could shoot at a galio for 12 seconds and still only get about 50% of his health despite a full build and several traps.

Granted, he was a lot stronger back then too.


But i guess Riot realized this during the LCS where every marksman aside from the hypercarries and Xayah were basically nonviable because they couldn't do enough damage to be relevant. 

So they chose to buff the bottom line to prevent such a thing, for diversity.

And didn't the first tank meta happen under season 5 or am i mistaken? I much more prefer the current situation over that.......although i do believe non tank melee could use a bit of beefing up.

This because tanks were given powerful defensive tools in which marksmen were given cheaper items in response, but this move left the rest of the melee's behind in the so called arms race.


Although i´ll admit that it's probably difficult to balance a damage melee to not have too much damage but also not be too tanky to the point where they become impossible to stop.

Especially given how different the amount of damage the marksmen deal, a Twitch will on average deal 21-22 k damage over a game while an Ashe will deal 17-18 k, how does one balance all the melees and the marksmen so that no one feels useless?

Meanwhile MF usually deals 23 k damage and Ezreal 24 k on average.


I do not know any good answer x)

It would be nice if Black Cleaver's Armor Shred passive would be disabled when you got any kind of lethality. I saw a lot of posts with make BC melee only but that would screw up Urgot and Gnar (maybe even more). I don't really like what's happening on the PBE right now. First Riot says, they will decide if they buff all Bruisers individually or if they give the Bruisers new runes. Right now they giving Bruiser(Juggernauts) a new rune, they buff all related Bruiser Items (mostly BC and Titanic) and they buff the champions. Seems like clusterfuck all over the place ...

Isn't this like the 2nd time this item has been reverted in some way? First it was the build path reverted, now it's the stats.
Don't get me wrong, I love it on champs as much as the next. (Gonna be great on {{champion:420}} ) But maybe the constant back and forth with the item indicates there's something wrong with it.

at least it still  has the health recipe. this should make it anoying to build on adc while bruisers either dont care or prefer the extra health over extra ad.

especially with the upcoming grasp changes.

The cleaver wont do that much. 6% isnt that much more. The real issue is tank items are too cheap, tanks have too much base damage and high armor/mr since its so cheap to get. You often lose extended trades against a tank with riven even with this item. (maybe ive played against too many maokai who always wins trades in the end).
I mean tanks aren't late game, their items should be cheap.
K, let's scrap the buffs then, will you be happy then?
im not even sure who i should permaban next patch. I thought darius might become S-tier next patch due to changes in keystones and black cleaver. I change my mind.

"Helping bruisers"
 
- Buffs {{item:3071}} 
- 5 damage to {{item:3077}} /{{item:3748}} with nothing done to {{item:3074}} 
- Buffs some of the most frustrating top lane melee champs
- Minor buffs to a few bruisers, one of which HAS A REWORK COMING IN JANUARY, making the buff a moot point
-  Nerfs two ranged top laners that are hardly seen anymore
- changing ONE marksman item to make more anti-tank focused (as it was made for) so long as your bruiser doesn't accidentally build too much health.

I've been liking what they have been doing with Divers of late and I know they are planning a more extensive update for the long term later, but I don't see how this is going to help like they said it would. A lot of the champs getting buffed are some of the most frustrating to play against top lane and will just make it all the more frustrating. 
I'm hoping its just still early and we will see more stuff in between now and the next update a week from now, cause I hate to say it, but this isn't going to cut it as is.
